thread.title: Yusuf Pathan is the first Indian cricketer to sign for a foreign league
thread.title_full: Yusuf Pathan is the first Indian cricketer to sign for a foreign league - Sports

author: PTI
title: Yusuf Pathan is the first Indian cricketer to sign for a foreign league
text:
Irafan Pathan and Yusuf Pathan 
New Delhi: Yusuf Pathan has become the first Indian male cricketer to sign for an overseas franchise-based T20 league and he feels the Hong Kong League in March will be ideal preparation for the upcoming IPL.
Pathan thanked the BCCI and Baroda Cricket Association (BCA) for allowing him to play in the league, which is scheduled to be held from March 8-12.
"I firstly want to thank the BCCI and BCA for giving me the NOC. I am really excited about this venture and I think it will be good preparation for the IPL. That is why I signed for it," Yusuf said, who plays for KKR in the IPL.
